prepareInstallation.description: The information required for the installation.

components.name: token
components.description: The token address that users can deposit and use for voting.

components.name: votingMode
components.description: A parameter to select the vote mode. In standard mode (0), early execution and vote replacement are disabled. In early execution mode (1), a proposal can be executed early before the end date if the vote outcome cannot mathematically change by more voters voting. In vote replacement mode (2), voters can change their vote multiple times and only the latest vote option is tallied.

components.name: supportThresholdRatio
components.description: The support threshold value. Its value has to be in the interval [0, 10^6) defined by `RATIO_BASE = 10**6`.

components.name: minParticipationRatio
components.description: The minimum participation value. Its value has to be in the interval [0, 10^6] defined by `RATIO_BASE = 10**6`.

components.name: minApprovalRatio
components.description: The minimum ratio of approvals required. Its value has to be in the interval [0, 10^6] defined by `RATIO_BASE = 10**6`.

components.name: proposalDuration
components.description: The duration of the proposal in seconds.

components.name: minProposerVotingPower
components.description: The minimum voting power required to create a proposal.

components.name: votingSettings
components.description: The voting settings that will be enforced when proposals are created.

components.name: pluginMetadata
components.description: The URI of the plugin metadata file on IPFS

components.name: createProposalCaller
components.description: The address that can create proposals (could be ANY_ADDR)

components.name: executeCaller
components.description: The address that can execute proposals that have succeeded (could be ANY_ADDR)

components.name: target
components.description: The address of the IExecutorwhere execute() will be called

components.name: operation
components.description: Wether execution triggers a call or a delegate call

components.name: targetConfig
components.description: The plugin settings that determine who the executor is and how it is used.

inputs.name: installParameters
inputs.description: The parameters of the plugin installation.

prepareUninstallation.description: No input is required for the uninstallation.
